track.name: Bird's Lament
comments: The story behind the composer is even more interesting than the song: check out Moondog on wikipedia.
I thought hurricane season was over
probably the best song ever written
So so nice, as used by mr scruff n dj yoda. One of my fave upbeat tunes. GROOVY!!!!!!!!

Zur Zeit werden wohl viele Moondog-Videos auf youtube gelöscht. Kaufen tu ich die CDs trotzdem nicht, weil mir einfach das Geld dazu fehlt. Aber ich schaue mal, was man in den öffentlichen Bibliotheken bekommt. Sonst muss ich wohl darauf verzichten.

@GanzPopp "Samples"? Heh. That's a goodun. He's basically ripped off the entire track. Goes a little bit further than just sampling, I'd say. Love Mr Scruff - but you've got to acklowledge Get A Move On is basically wholesale theft.
